channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 10/03/2024 # Bugfix # Fixed incorrect or incomplete bot names when joining meetings due to Google Meet page loading issues. Fixed issue where canceling a plan prevented users from initiating new meetings from the meeting list. Updated wording for pricing plans. 09/26/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Automatically switch to “Final Summary” when the meeting ends. Adjusted the meeting list to display the summary title instead of summary content.
